title: UT Health San Antonio researchers develop AI tool to diagnose brain disease in seconds
cleaned_text: South Texas through preeminence in brain health As Texas' only NIA-designated Alzheimer's Disease Research Center, the Biggs Institute honors brain donations as it unlocks the mysteries of disease. 1 of 4NCI-designated Cancer Centers in Texas 60Degree & Certificate Programs $360M (FY 22)Annual Sponsored Program Awards & Research Activity Happening now at UT Health San Antonio We do everything it takes to support the health needs of our city and surrounding region through academics, research, patient care and service to the community. Stay informed on the latest news and events and discover how you can be a part of our mission to make lives better.
